title: Admission doubt
content:
Hey guys so I’ve taken a seat through PESSAT and attended the counselling as well.
People who attended the counselling, we finished the admission process there itself or is there any further steps that we have to take??

I have gotten login credentials for the app and everything.
But on the pes website “important dates” column there’s a thing mentioning “last date for submission of original documents/surrendering seat” as July 25th

Do we have to submit documents again even after submitting once during counselling time admission or how is it ?

comments.body: Guys i have the exact same doubt, like on the day of couselling i submitted all the documents except tc and study certificate cause i didnt have them at the moment, plzz help

If you have submitted the original documents
On the day of counselling itself then you dont have to do anything else you can wait till classes start 

If you submitted photo copies of the original documents it only counts as a provisional admission
And you have to submit the original documents before the 25th July

Cheak the acknowledgement slip 
If any of the boxed are untucked by them the u have to submit those documents before 25th
